amendment.description: To reduce the total amount authorized to be appropriated for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal year 2011 to the total amount authorized to be appropriated for the Administration for fiscal year 2008.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 21 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 18.

Amendment SA 21 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S531; text: CR S531) To reduce the total amount authorized to be appropriated for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal year 2011 to the total amount authorized to be appropriated for the Administration for fiscal year 2008.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 21 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 18.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 21 proposed by Senator Paul.
